title: Update Q1 answer options and correct answer date

requirements.text: Update the quiz content for Q1 (the first question) so that the question "When is our anniversary (don't check my status oops)?" has exactly these options in this order: A) "14th Feb 2021", B) "25th Nov 2021", C) "26th Nov 2021", D) "You were born knowing me"; and set the correct answer to "25th Nov 2021".

quotes:

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/data/quizContent.ts, Q1 options are exactly: ['14th Feb 2021','25th Nov 2021','26th Nov 2021','You were born knowing me'] in that order.
In frontend/src/data/quizContent.ts, Q1 correctAnswer is exactly '25th Nov 2021'.

When running the app, Q1 renders these updated option texts, and selecting '25th Nov 2021' is evaluated as correct (triggers the correct-answer feedback), while the other three options are evaluated as incorrect.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only Shadcn components).
Do not change the backend; keep all quiz content managed in the existing frontend data source.
nonGoals: Do not change the wording of the Q1 question text.
Do not change any other questions, options, scoring rules, animations, or result screens.
